import Header from './Header.js' import Main from './Main.js' import Footer from './Footer.js' import PopupWithForm from './PopupWithForm.js'; import { useState } from 'react'; function App() { const [isEditProfilePopupOpen, setIsEditProfilePopupOpen] = useState(false); const [isAddPlacePopupOpen, setIsAddPlacePopupOpen] = useState(false); const [isEditAvatarPopupOpen, setIsEditAvatarPopupOpen] = useState(false); const handleEditProfileClick = () => setIsEditProfilePopupOpen(true); const handleAddPlaceClick = () => setIsAddPlacePopupOpen(true); const handleEditAvatarClick = () => setIsEditAvatarPopupOpen(true); const closeAllPopups = (e) => { if ( e.type === "keydown" || e.target.classList.contains("popup_opened") || e.target.classList.contains("popup__close") ) { setIsAddPlacePopupOpen(false); setIsEditAvatarPopupOpen(false); setIsEditProfilePopupOpen(false); } }; return (

} /> {/*

Редактировать профиль

Новое место

Обновить автар

Вы уверены?

*/}
); } export default App;
